response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its worth to me and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $100. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value I see in delivering exceptional products to those who appreciate them. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 100}
